text:
e="preserve">Gerard Milton Earnhart (April 1, 1918 – June 6, 2020) was an American politician and broadcast journalist. He was a Democratic member of the Arkansas House of Representatives and Arkansas Senate from the years of 1959 to 1980. He was born in Pine Lawn, Missouri.
Earnhart died on June 6, 2020 in Fort Smith, Arkansas at the age of 102.
